turn.context: The earthquake was so strong, I thought the building would collapse!

dialogue.text: The earthquake was so strong, I thought the building would collapse!
that sounds absolutely horrible! how did you get out?
We had to melt snow for water and use candles for light.
i know thats right, i dont know how they survived without electric

chain_of_empathy.emotion_cause: Experiencing fear and uncertainty due to experiencing a major earthquake.
chain_of_empathy.goal_to_response: Providing comfort and sharing similar experiences to reduce fear.

turn.context: I'm so grateful for the stranger who helped me when my car broke down!

dialogue.text: I'm so grateful for the stranger who helped me when my car broke down!
good mentors are invaluable! what advice have they given you?
It really restored my faith in humanity.
having that support makes all the difference

chain_of_empathy.event_scenario: Having family visit during lonely period.
chain_of_empathy.emotion_cause: Feeling deep appreciation and thankfulness for having family visit during lonely period.
chain_of_empathy.goal_to_response: Acknowledging the positive experience and reinforcing good feelings.

turn.context: I got lost hiking and couldn't find the trail for hours, it was terrifying!

dialogue.text: I got lost hiking and couldn't find the trail for hours, it was terrifying!
that sounds absolutely horrible! how did you get out?
It's scary, unless you are prepared, you're wondering how to live life without it.
at least you made it through safely, that's what matters

chain_of_empathy.event_scenario: A prolonged power outage during a severe ice storm.
chain_of_empathy.emotion_cause: Experiencing fear and uncertainty due to a prolonged power outage during a severe ice storm.
chain_of_empathy.goal_to_response: Providing comfort and sharing similar experiences to reduce fear.
